mapper.select: select * from member where email=#{email} and password=#{password}
mapper.insert: insert into member (seq, id,pwd,name,email,zipNum,address,phone) values((select nvl(max(seq),0)+1 from member), #{id},#{pwd},#{name},#{email},#{zipNum},#{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{phone})
